title: Mubert - Thousands of Staff-Picked Royalty-Free Music Tracks for Streaming, Videos, Podcasts, Commercial Use and Online Content
introduction: Mubert is an AI music generator platform that offers different products for content creators, artists, developers, and listeners. It uses Artificial Intelligence to instantly generate royalty-free AI music tailored to the content's purpose.
features: Generate AI soundtrack for video content, podcasts, and apps
Earn money by contributing samples and loops
Get original AI music for products
Find AI tunes for any moment
targetPeople: Content creators, artists, developers, and listeners

faqs.question: Why are we different from competitors?
faqs.answer: Mubert uses AI to generate royalty-free AI music instantly, flawlessly suited to the content's purpose, with millions of samples from hundreds of artists.

faqs.question: How to remove the watermark?
faqs.answer: The generated tracks are royalty-free and do not have watermarks.

faqs.question: What is the difference between the generation modes? (track/jingle/loop/mix)
faqs.answer: The different generation modes allow users to create tracks, jingles, loops, or mixes based on their needs.

faqs.question: How many tracks can I generate?
faqs.answer: Users can generate an unlimited number of tracks based on their subscription plan.

faqs.question: Do I own the rights to music created with Mubert?
faqs.answer: Yes, users own the rights to the music created with Mubert.
